snippet: Timbuk2, a maker of luggage and accessories, has joined with Joey Energy to create a pair of bags with a brainy battery that keeps your devices charged up on the go.
abstract: Timbuk2, a maker of luggage and accessories, has joined with Joey Energy to create a pair of bags with a brainy battery that keeps your devices charged up on the go.

headline.main: Laptop Luggage With a Brainy Battery
headline.print_headline: Luggage With a Battery That Charges Devices on the Go
